verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor, [A] Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-Da-Vid of David יְ֭הֹוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- who יָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> ya-Gur who shall abide בְּאָהֳלֶ֑ךָ <S%H168><s%> be-'o-ho-Le-cha; tent מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- who יִ֝שְׁכֹּ֗ן <S%H7931><s%> yish-Kon, may dwell בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har hill קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H6944><s%> kod-She-cha in thy holy

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech He that walketh תָּ֭מִים <S%H8549><s%> Ta-mim uprightly וּפֹעֵ֥ל <S%H6466><s%> u-fo-'El and worketh צֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek; righteousness וְדֹבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> ve-do-Ver and speaketh אֱ֝מֶ֗ת <S%H571><s%> 'e-Met, the truth בִּלְבָבֽוֹ׃ <S%H3824><s%> bil-va-Vo. in his heart

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor רָגַ֨ל׀ <S%H7270><s%> ra-Gal [He that] backbiteth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against לְשֹׁנ֗וֹ <S%H3956><s%> le-sho-No, not with his tongue לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah nor doeth לְרֵעֵ֣הוּ <S%H7453><s%> le-re-'E-hu to his neighbour רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah; evil וְ֝חֶרְפָּ֗ה <S%H2781><s%> ve-cher-Pah, a reproach לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor נָשָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa nor taketh up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against קְרֹֽבוֹ׃ <S%H7138><s%> ke-Roov. against his neighbour

נִבְזֶ֤ה׀ <S%H959><s%> niv-Zeh is contemned בְּֽעֵ֘ינָ֤יו <S%H5869><s%> be-'Ei-Nav In whose eyes נִמְאָ֗ס <S%H3988><s%> nim-'As, a vile person וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יִרְאֵ֣י <S%H3373><s%> yir-'Ei them that fear יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD יְכַבֵּ֑ד <S%H3513><s%> ye-chab-Bed; but he honoureth נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' [He that] sweareth לְ֝הָרַ֗ע <S%H7489><s%> le-ha-Ra', to [his own] hurt וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and does not יָמִֽר׃ <S%H4171><s%> ya-Mir. and changeth

כַּסְפּ֤וֹ׀ <S%H3701><s%> kas-Po his money לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan [He that] putteth not out בְּנֶשֶׁךְ֮ <S%H5392><s%> be-ne-sheCh to usury וְשֹׁ֥חַד <S%H7810><s%> ve-Sho-chad reward עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against נָקִ֗י <S%H5355><s%> na-Ki, against the innocent לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor לָ֫קָ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach nor taketh עֹֽשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-seh- He that doeth אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh; these לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor יִמּ֣וֹט <S%H4131><s%> yim-Mot be moved לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. these [things] shall never
